participant_abstract.sent: This was our third meeting to date.
The team feel comfortable with eachother, and don't hesitate to mention if they are unhappy with a particular point.
The meeting was very usefull in clearing up all of the ideas we'd had floating about.
We made a lot of important decisions.

participant_decisions.sent: 1)We will use a kinetic charger for our product.
2) We will use the standard chip on the market - TA11835.
3) We want to incorporate a standby function.
5)The buttons will be a combination of LCD and rubber according to the design.
6)We will use bright, funky designs for the casing.
7)we will try to incorporate voice recognition software into our design.
8) the rubber buttons we will use will be anti Repetitive Strain Injury.

participant_problems.sent: We are worried about the costs involved with our design.
